explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the relationship between corporate social responsibility (CSR) and idiosyncratic risk in the restaurant industry, as well as the moderating effect of brand diversification. The study uses fixed effect regression with robust standard errors for analysis, which is a traditional statistical method. There is no mention or implication of any machine learning techniques, algorithms, or models in the title or abstract. The research is grounded in corporate finance and strategic management, not in machine learning or artificial intelligence.
